comments:
Build ID: I20061214-1445

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Start with JOnAS already on the machine.  Run eclipse -debug -consoleLog and create a fresh workspace
2.Window -> Preferences -> Server -> Installed Runtimes (which should be empty), select Add
3. Expand ObjectWeb, select JOnAS, press Next
4. Change the JonAS Installation Directory to a valid value, and change the JonAS Configuration Directory to the same value... note that Finish is now enabled.
5. Press Finish

Note:  The NPE is written out to the console.  It does not appear in the .log file.

Here is the pertinent part:
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.jst.server.generic.ui.internal.GenericServerWizardFragment.enter(GenericServerWizardFragment.java:131)
        at org.eclipse.wst.server.ui.internal.wizard.TaskWizard$3.run(TaskWizard.java:175)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.UILockListener.doPendingWork(UILockListener.java:155)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.UISynchronizer$1.run(UISynchronizer.java:36)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:35)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages(Synchronizer.java:123)
        ... 58 more

More information:
On step 5, if you press next instead of finish, the NPE does not occur.
Fix released to HEAD, will release shortly for build.
